name: The Lion King III: Timon & Pumbaa
overview: The Lion King III: Timon & Pumbaa is the first known Dragon Co. release, which is known mainly as a 'coding practice' game for Tommy Xie, Dragon Co.'s lead programmer. The game itself is not only loosely based on The Lion King full-length movie, but also an animated series spinoff, The Lion King's Timon & Pumbaa. It is a prequel to The Lion King V: Timon & Pumbaa.
